Test_Description: Verify heating system responds to on/off commands
Test_Steps: 1) Send SEAT_CTRL_CMD with Heat Enable = 0; 2) Verify heater disabled; 3) Send SEAT_CTRL_CMD with Heat Enable = 1; 4) Verify heater enabled within 100ms
Expected_Result: Heater responds to enable/disable command within 100ms

Test_Description: Verify low heating mode operates at correct power level
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to Low (30W); 2) Monitor current draw for 60s; 3) Calculate power consumption; 4) Check stability
Expected_Result: Power consumption 30W ± 3W; Stable within tolerance

Test_Description: Verify medium heating mode operates at correct power level
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to Medium (50W); 2) Monitor current draw for 60s; 3) Calculate power consumption; 4) Check stability
Expected_Result: Power consumption 50W ± 5W; Stable within tolerance

Test_Description: Verify high heating mode operates at correct power level
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to High (70W); 2) Monitor current draw for 60s; 3) Calculate power consumption; 4) Check stability
Expected_Result: Power consumption 70W ± 7W; Stable within tolerance

Test_Description: Verify temperature sensor accuracy within specification
Test_Steps: 1) Record ambient temperature independently; 2) Read SCM sensor value via CAN; 3) Compare readings; 4) Repeat at 5 different setpoints
Expected_Result: Temperature reading within ±2°C of reference

Test_Description: Verify heating response time from 20°C to 40°C
Test_Steps: 1) Set High intensity (70W); 2) Record start time; 3) Monitor temperature every 10s; 4) Record time to reach 40°C
Expected_Result: Time to reach 40°C within 120 seconds

Test_Description: Verify system respects 65°C maximum limit
Precondition: Heater at high setting; ambient warm
Test_Steps: 1) Enable high intensity heating; 2) Monitor temperature continuously; 3) Allow to stabilize; 4) Verify max temperature reached
Expected_Result: Temperature limited to ≤65°C

Test_Description: Verify heating disables at >68°C threshold
Test_Steps: 1) Artificially increase temperature sensor reading to >68°C via HIL; 2) Monitor heater output; 3) Verify immediate shutdown
Expected_Result: Heater immediately de-energized when temp >68°C
Pass_Criteria: Heater PWM = 0% within 10ms of threshold; Shutdown logged

Test_Description: Verify SEAT_HEAT_STATUS message sent every 100ms
Test_Steps: 1) Capture 10 consecutive SEAT_HEAT_STATUS messages; 2) Calculate inter-message timing; 3) Measure jitter
Expected_Result: Messages received at 100ms ± 10ms intervals

Test_Description: Verify heating operates at minimum voltage
Precondition: Supply voltage set to 8.0V; heating enabled
Test_Steps: 1) Set voltage to 8.0V; 2) Enable high intensity; 3) Measure power for 60s; 4) Verify operation
Expected_Result: Heater operates; power output maintained within ±10%

Test_Description: Verify heating operates at maximum voltage
Precondition: Supply voltage set to 14.4V; heating enabled
Test_Steps: 1) Set voltage to 14.4V; 2) Enable high intensity; 3) Measure power for 60s; 4) Verify operation
Expected_Result: Heater operates; power output maintained within ±10%

Test_Description: Verify all heating events logged with timestamp
Test_Steps: 1) Enable/disable heating 5 times; 2) Access diagnostic buffer; 3) Verify each event logged; 4) Confirm timestamp accuracy
Expected_Result: All on/off transitions logged with timestamp

Test_Description: Verify massage system responds to on/off commands
Test_Steps: 1) Send SEAT_CTRL_CMD with Massage Enable = 0; 2) Verify pump disabled; 3) Send SEAT_CTRL_CMD with Massage Enable = 1; 4) Verify pump enabled within 500ms
Expected_Result: Pump responds to enable/disable command within 500ms

Test_Description: Verify level 1 massage intensity (20% duty cycle)
Precondition: Massage system operational; pressure sensor ready
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to 1; 2) Monitor pump duty cycle; 3) Measure for 30s; 4) Verify 20% duty cycle
Expected_Result: Pump duty cycle 20% ± 5%; Pressure maintained at target

Test_Description: Verify level 3 massage intensity (60% duty cycle)
Precondition: Massage system operational; pressure sensor ready
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to 3; 2) Monitor pump duty cycle; 3) Measure for 30s; 4) Verify 60% duty cycle
Expected_Result: Pump duty cycle 60% ± 5%; Pressure maintained at target

Test_Description: Verify level 5 massage intensity (100% duty cycle)
Precondition: Massage system operational; pressure sensor ready
Test_Steps: 1) Set intensity to 5; 2) Monitor pump duty cycle; 3) Measure for 30s; 4) Verify 100% duty cycle
Expected_Result: Pump duty cycle 100%; Pressure maintained at target

Test_Description: Verify wave pattern operates with correct zone sequence
Test_Steps: 1) Select wave pattern; 2) Enable massage; 3) Monitor solenoid valve states for 12s (3 cycles); 4) Verify sequence
Expected_Result: Left → Center → Right → Center sequence repeats
Pass_Criteria: Correct sequence observed for all 3 cycles; timing ±100ms

Test_Description: Verify pulse pattern operates correctly
Test_Steps: 1) Select pulse pattern; 2) Enable massage; 3) Monitor pump for 10s; 4) Verify 1s ON/OFF cycles
Expected_Result: Pump alternates ON 0.5s / OFF 0.5s continuously
Pass_Criteria: 10 complete ON/OFF cycles observed; timing accurate

Test_Description: Verify continuous pattern with all zones active
Test_Steps: 1) Select continuous pattern; 2) Enable massage; 3) Monitor pump/valve states for 60s
Expected_Result: Pump runs continuously; all solenoid valves energized
Pass_Criteria: Pump and valves continuously active for 60s

Test_Description: Verify pressure maintained at setpoint for level 3
Precondition: Massage system with pressure sensor; level 3 selected
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage level 3; 2) Monitor pressure for 60s; 3) Calculate mean and variance
Expected_Result: Pressure maintained at 120 ± 10 kPa

Test_Description: Verify pressure maintained at low intensity setpoint
Precondition: Massage system with pressure sensor; level 1 selected
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage level 1; 2) Monitor pressure for 60s; 3) Calculate mean pressure; 4) Verify stability
Expected_Result: Pressure maintained at 80 ± 10 kPa
Pass_Criteria: Mean pressure 70-90 kPa; steady state achieved

Test_Description: Verify pump reaches target pressure within 500ms
Precondition: Massage system ready; pump at atmospheric pressure
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage at level 3; 2) Record start time; 3) Monitor pressure; 4) Record time to reach 100 kPa
Expected_Result: Pump reaches 100 kPa within 500ms
Pass_Criteria: 80+ kPa achieved in ≤500ms from enable command

Test_Description: Verify pressure relief activates at >150 kPa
Precondition: Massage system operational; pressure sensor ready
Test_Steps: 1) Simulate system fault causing overpressure; 2) Monitor pressure continuously; 3) Verify relief valve activates
Expected_Result: Pressure limited to ≤150 kPa; relief valve open
Pass_Criteria: Maximum pressure ≤150 kPa during fault condition

Test_Description: Verify SEAT_MASSAGE_STATUS message sent every 100ms
Test_Steps: 1) Capture 10 SEAT_MASSAGE_STATUS messages; 2) Calculate inter-message timing; 3) Measure jitter
Expected_Result: Messages received at 100ms ± 10ms intervals

Test_Description: Verify massage disables after 30 minutes continuous operation
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage; 2) Simulate 30 minute duration; 3) Monitor pump state at 30m mark; 4) Verify auto-shutdown
Expected_Result: Pump automatically disables at 30-minute mark

Test_Description: Verify pump failure detection when pressure not reached
Precondition: Massage enabled; pressure sensor ready; pump failure simulated
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage; 2) Simulate pump fault (no pressure increase); 3) Monitor status for 10s; 4) Verify fault logged
Expected_Result: Pump fault detected and logged within 10s; pump disabled
Pass_Criteria: Fault flag set in status; error logged with timestamp

Test_Description: Verify both subsystems operate together without interference
Precondition: Both systems operational; power supply adequate
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating high intensity; 2) Concurrently enable massage level 3; 3) Monitor both for 60s; 4) Verify independent operation
Expected_Result: Heating and massage both active; no loss of control

Test_Description: Verify consistent 100ms cycle time for all CAN messages
Test_Steps: 1) Capture 50 CAN message pairs; 2) Measure cycle times; 3) Calculate variance; 4) Verify tolerance
Expected_Result: Cycle time maintained at 100 ± 10ms across all messages

Test_Description: Verify system handles CAN communication loss
Test_Steps: 1) Send normal SEAT_CTRL_CMD; 2) Stop sending commands for 600ms; 3) Monitor SCM state; 4) Resume commands; 5) Verify recovery
Expected_Result: System maintains last known state; timeout logged; recovers on resume
Pass_Criteria: System state unchanged during timeout; communication restored

Test_Description: Verify rapid transitions don't cause conflicts
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating and massage simultaneously; 2) Wait 5s; 3) Disable both simultaneously; 4) Repeat 5 times
Expected_Result: Both transitions smooth; no conflicts or race conditions
Pass_Criteria: All 5 cycles completed successfully; no anomalies

Test_Description: Verify all sensor values accessible via diagnostic interface
Precondition: SCM operational; diagnostic CAN commands available
Test_Steps: 1) Issue read command for temperature; 2) Read pressure; 3) Read voltage; 4) Read all status flags; 5) Verify values match current readings
Expected_Result: All sensor values successfully read via diagnostic CAN
Pass_Criteria: All 5 sensor values match live system readings ±tolerance

Test_Description: Verify system enters safe state on MCU fault
Test_Steps: 1) Simulate MCU fault (watchdog trigger); 2) Monitor outputs; 3) Verify heating and massage disabled; 4) Check status flag
Expected_Result: System immediately enters safe state: heater PWM=0%; pump disabled
Pass_Criteria: All outputs de-energized within 5ms of fault detection

Test_Description: Verify immediate heating shutdown on >68°C
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating; 2) Ramp temperature to 68°C; 3) Verify heater active; 4) Push temp to 69°C; 5) Verify immediate shutdown
Expected_Result: Heater de-energized immediately when exceeding 68°C
Pass_Criteria: Heater output zero within 10ms; event logged

Test_Description: Verify pump shuts off at >150 kPa
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage; 2) Ramp pressure to 150 kPa; 3) Verify pump active; 4) Push pressure to 151 kPa; 5) Verify pump off
Expected_Result: Pump de-energized immediately when exceeding 150 kPa
Pass_Criteria: Pump output zero within 10ms; relief valve open; event logged

Test_Description: Verify all faults logged with proper timestamps
Test_Steps: 1) Trigger 3 different fault conditions; 2) Access fault log; 3) Verify each logged; 4) Confirm timestamps accurate; 5) Verify log capacity
Expected_Result: All faults logged with accurate timestamp; log wraps at 100 events
Pass_Criteria: All 3 faults recorded with ±1s timestamp accuracy

Test_Description: Verify no excessive oscillation around setpoint
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating; 2) Monitor temperature for 5 minutes; 3) Measure overshoot/undershoot; 4) Verify stability criteria
Expected_Result: Setpoint ±2°C; overshoot <5°C; damping ratio >0.7

Test_Description: Verify pressure stability when zones load changes
Precondition: Massage active; continuous pattern; pressure sensor ready
Test_Steps: 1) Enable massage level 3; 2) Abruptly switch to level 5; 3) Monitor pressure during transition; 4) Verify rapid re-stabilization
Expected_Result: Pressure reaches new setpoint within 2 seconds; overshoot <15 kPa
Pass_Criteria: Pressure stable within ±10 kPa 1s after level change

Test_Description: Verify system behavior with voltage dip (8V)
Test_Steps: 1) Run heating and massage at nominal; 2) Drop supply voltage to 8V; 3) Monitor both subsystems; 4) Restore voltage
Expected_Result: Both systems degrade gracefully; no shutdown unless <7V
Pass_Criteria: No unexpected resets; controlled state change

Test_Description: Verify system robust to irregular CAN timing
Test_Steps: 1) Send CAN messages with ±50ms jitter; 2) Monitor system state; 3) Verify functional operation continues; 4) No false timeouts
Expected_Result: System tolerates jitter; operates correctly; no timeout false triggers
Pass_Criteria: Normal operation maintained; no spurious fault flags

Test_Description: Verify heater handles repeated enable/disable cycles
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating; 2) Allow to reach 50°C; 3) Disable; 4) Wait 60s for cool down; 5) Repeat 20 times; 6) Monitor for degradation
Expected_Result: Consistent response across 20 cycles; no power reduction

Test_Description: Verify smooth transitions between massage patterns
Test_Steps: 1) Run pattern A (wave); 2) Switch to pattern B (pulse) while active; 3) Repeat 10 times; 4) Monitor pressure stability
Expected_Result: Pressure maintained within ±15 kPa during switches; no jerks
Pass_Criteria: All 10 transitions smooth; maximum pressure deviation 15 kPa

Test_Description: Verify no degradation after 2 hours simultaneous heating/massage
Test_Steps: 1) Enable heating high + massage level 3; 2) Run for 120 minutes; 3) Monitor performance metrics every 10 min; 4) Check for drift
Expected_Result: Performance stable across 120 minute duration; no degradation
Pass_Criteria: All metrics within ±5% of initial values at 120 minute mark
